sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ast_contract_instance</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Contract Instance</name> <order>100</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var contract = new GlideRecord("ast_contract"); contract.get(current.ast_contract); current.contract_type = contract.sys_class_name.getDisplayValue(); var ci = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci"); ci.get(current.ci_item); current.ci_type = ci.sys_class_name.getDisplayValue();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2005-05-25 21:07:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>15ae5326c611227500d1863613d89f49</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Contract Instance</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Contract Management" source="com.snc.contract_management">53e738ac3cb1311068bcf327dfe37ff3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_15ae5326c611227500d1863613d89f49</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:02:50</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=15ae5326c611227500d1863613d89f49"/> </record_update>
